title: Streaming service subscribers in India 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Video-on-demand Service in the x axis and Number of subscribers in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of subscribers in millions 63.0 is found at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and the minimum is found at Ozee TV where Number of subscribers in millions is 2.4.
The highest Video-on-demand Service Hotstar has 60.6 more Number of subscribers in millions than the lowest Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Video-on-demand Service, and Number of subscribers in millions in each Video-on-demand Service on the y axis.
The Number of subscribers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and lowest at Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Video-on-demand Service in the x axis and Number of subscribers in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of subscribers in millions 63.0 is found at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and the minimum is found at Ozee TV where Number of subscribers in millions is 2.4.
The highest Video-on-demand Service Hotstar has 60.6 more Number of subscribers in millions than the lowest Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of subscribers in millions for 6 number of Video-on-demand Services.
The maximum Number of subscribers in millions 63.0 is found at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and the minimum is found at Ozee TV where Number of subscribers in millions is 2.4.
Video-on-demand Service Hotstar has 26.25 times more Number of subscribers in millions than Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV which is has the lowest.
Video-on-demand Service Hotstar is higher than any other Video-on-demand Services with value 63.0, followed by , and Amazon Video. Down to Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV with the lowest value 2.4.
The average Number of subscribers in millions in all 6 Video-on-demand Services is 16.15.
Summing up the values of all Video-on-demand Services, we get total 96.9.
